pages.text: This page Showcases all the Swords Currently/Used by Roronoa Zoro as well as the Prices/Obtainability of the Weapons.

pages.title: Wado Ichimonji
pages.text: Wado Ichimonji can be Obtained as a Boss Drop from Roronoa Zoro or Bought from a Wandering Trader for 48 Emeralds.

pages.title: Sandai Kitetsu
pages.text: Sandai Kietsu can be Obtained as a Boss Drop from Roronoa Zoro or Bought from a Wandering Trader for 16 Emeralds & 8 Diamonds.
